int cvl_taglist_length ( const cvl_taglist_t *  taglist  ) 

Parameters:
taglist The tag list.
Returns:
The length of the tag list.
Returns the length of the taglist. Can be used with cvl_taglist_get_i() to loop over all tags in the list.

void cvl_taglist_get_i ( const cvl_taglist_t *  taglist,
int  i,
const char **  name,
const char **  value 
)

Parameters:
taglist The tag list.
i An index.
name Storage space for a pointer to the tag name.
value Storage space for a pointer to the tag value.
Returns pointers to the name and value of tag i in and value. Use cvl_taglist_length() to find out the number of tags in a tag list.

const char* cvl_taglist_get ( const cvl_taglist_t *  taglist,
const char *  name 
)

Parameters:
taglist The tag list.
name A name.
Returns a pointer to the value associated with the tag name in the tag list taglist. If there is no such name, NULL is returned.

void cvl_taglist_put ( cvl_taglist_t *  taglist,
const char *  name,
const char *  value 
)

Parameters:
taglist The tag list.
name A tag name.
value A tag value.
Puts the given tag (name and value) into the tag list taglist. If name is already in the tag list, its value is overwritten.

cvl_taglist_t* cvl_taglist_copy ( const cvl_taglist_t *  taglist  ) 

Parameters:
taglist The tag list.
Returns:
A copy of the tag list.
Copies the tag list taglist.
